subject: our community
blurb: Everything here is hard, and bright, and violent... This is hell.

subject: the law
blurb: Human rules don't apply. There's only me. I AM the law.

subject: violence
blurb: Death, carnage - it's a Buffy party!

subject: global issues
blurb: The hardest thing in this world is to live in it.

subject: death
blurb: I may be dead, but I'm still pretty.

subject: her powers
blurb: I say we change the rules. I say MY power should be OUR power.
